templateContent: Good morning, {name}! What's one simple thing you're grateful for today? It could be as small as a warm cup of tea or the sound of birds outside your window.
audioPrompt: Take a moment to reflect on something that brings you joy today, no matter how small. Noticing these simple pleasures can brighten your entire day.

templateContent: I hope your day is going well, {name}. Can you take a moment to appreciate someone who has made a positive difference in your life, even in a small way?
audioPrompt: Think about someone who has helped you along the way - a friend, family member, or even a kind stranger. Gratitude for others strengthens our connections.

templateContent: As the day winds down, {name}, what went well today that you can appreciate? Even finding one positive moment can improve your wellbeing.
audioPrompt: Before you settle in for the evening, let's reflect on something positive from today. What brought you a moment of joy, comfort, or satisfaction?

templateContent: Take a deep breath and notice how your body feels this morning, {name}. No need to change anything, just observe with kindness.
audioPrompt: Let's start the day with awareness. Notice your breathing, the feeling of sitting or standing, and the sounds around you. This moment of presence can help ground you for the day ahead.

templateContent: Pause for a moment, {name}. What do you notice around you right now? Try to find one thing you haven't paid attention to before.
audioPrompt: Let's take a short mindfulness break. Observe your surroundings with fresh eyes - colors, textures, or sounds you might usually overlook. This simple practice can refresh your mind.

templateContent: As evening approaches, {name}, take three slow breaths. Feel the rhythm of your breathing and allow your shoulders to relax.
audioPrompt: The day is winding down. Let's take a moment to breathe slowly and release any tension you might be holding. This simple practice can help prepare your body and mind for rest.

templateContent: {name}, what's one small thing you'd like to accomplish today that would make you feel good? It doesn't have to be big.
audioPrompt: Setting a simple intention for the day can give us direction and purpose. What's one achievable thing that would make today feel meaningful to you?

templateContent: Think about a challenge you've overcome in your life, {name}. What personal strength helped you through it?
audioPrompt: We all have inner resources that have helped us through difficult times. Remembering these strengths can help us feel more confident when facing new challenges.

templateContent: Looking back on today, {name}, what's one thing you did that you can feel good about, no matter how small?
audioPrompt: As the day comes to a close, let's acknowledge something positive you contributed today. Recognizing our own efforts, even small ones, builds self-appreciation.

templateContent: Remember, {name}, that it's okay to take things one step at a time today. You don't have to rush.
audioPrompt: Good morning. I want to remind you that it's perfectly fine to move at your own pace today. Each small step is still progress, and you're doing just fine.

templateContent: Whatever you're feeling right now is okay, {name}. Emotions come and go like weather patterns, and you've weathered many storms before.
audioPrompt: Taking a moment to check in with yourself. Remember that all feelings are valid, even difficult ones. You've moved through challenging emotions before, and you'll move through these too.

templateContent: As this day ends, {name}, remember that tomorrow is a fresh start. You've made it through every day so far, and that's something to be proud of.
audioPrompt: The day is coming to a close. Whatever happened today - good or challenging - tomorrow brings new possibilities. Your resilience has carried you this far, and it will carry you forward.

templateContent: Here's a gentle brain exercise, {name}: Can you name three blue things you might see during your day today?
audioPrompt: Let's wake up our minds with a simple observation game. Think about blue objects you might encounter today. This kind of attention exercise helps keep our minds sharp and observant.

templateContent: Try this word puzzle, {name}: How many words can you make from the letters in 'SUNSHINE'?
audioPrompt: Here's a fun midday brain teaser to keep your mind active. See how many words you can create using only the letters found in the word 'sunshine'. Even a few words is great exercise for your brain!

templateContent: As the day winds down, {name}, can you recall three good things that happened today? Big or small, all positive moments count.
audioPrompt: Before the day ends, let's exercise our memory and positive thinking. Try to remember three good moments from today. This practice strengthens both memory and our ability to notice the positive.

templateContent: Good morning, {name}! Remember to take any morning medications with a full glass of water today.
audioPrompt: Starting your day with a gentle reminder about your morning medications. Taking them with a full glass of water helps them work effectively. Your health is important!

templateContent: {name}, how about doing some gentle stretches? Even a few minutes of movement can improve circulation and help you feel more energized.
audioPrompt: Taking a short break for gentle movement can help your body feel more comfortable and energized. Perhaps try some simple stretches for your shoulders or a short walk around the room. Your body will thank you!

templateContent: Evening reminder, {name}: Have you had enough water today? Staying hydrated supports all your body's functions.
audioPrompt: As the day winds down, let's think about hydration. Drinking enough water helps our bodies function at their best. Perhaps enjoy a glass of water now as we reflect on the importance of this simple self-care practice.

templateContent: Good morning, {name}! Is there someone you haven't connected with recently who might appreciate hearing from you today?
audioPrompt: Social connections enrich our lives. Take a moment to think about a friend or family member you haven't spoken with lately. A quick call or message can brighten both your days and strengthen your bond.

templateContent: Midday thought, {name}: What's a positive story or experience you could share with someone today? Sharing joy multiplies it.
audioPrompt: We all have stories and experiences worth sharing. Think about a positive moment or memory you could tell someone about today. Sharing our stories helps us connect with others and often brings unexpected joy to both people.

templateContent: Evening reflection, {name}: How did your interactions with others go today? Remember that even small connections matter.
audioPrompt: As the day comes to a close, let's reflect on our social connections today. Whether brief encounters or deeper conversations, each interaction shapes our sense of belonging and community. Acknowledging these connections helps us appreciate their value in our lives.

templateContent: Good morning, {name}! What's a happy memory from your childhood that still brings you joy when you think about it?
audioPrompt: Our early memories often hold special moments that continue to bring us happiness throughout our lives. Take a moment to recall a fond childhood memory - perhaps a special occasion, a favorite place, or time with loved ones.

templateContent: {name}, what's one of your favorite family traditions or gatherings? What makes it special to you?
audioPrompt: Family traditions create meaningful connections across generations. Reflecting on these shared experiences helps us appreciate the bonds we've built and the values we share. What traditions have been significant in your life?

templateContent: Evening reflection, {name}: What's a place you've visited that left a lasting impression on you? What made it special?
audioPrompt: Places shape our experiences and memories in unique ways. As we wind down the day, let's recall a place that made a significant impression on you - perhaps for its beauty, the people you met there, or something you learned or experienced.

templateContent: Happy Birthday, {name}! Today is a wonderful opportunity to reflect on the gift of another year of life. What are you most grateful for about this past year?
audioPrompt: Happy Birthday! Birthdays give us a chance to celebrate not just the day, but the gift of life itself. As you begin this special day, take a moment to reflect on something you're particularly thankful for from this past year of your journey.

templateContent: Happy Holidays, {name}! During this special season, what traditions or moments bring you the most joy?
audioPrompt: The holiday season brings opportunities for reflection and appreciation. Whether it's cherished traditions, special foods, or time with loved ones - even in memory - these holiday moments can fill our hearts with gratitude.

templateContent: Happy Anniversary, {name}! Today marks a special milestone. What memory from this relationship brings you the most joy to recall?
audioPrompt: Anniversaries invite us to celebrate and reflect on meaningful relationships. Whether with a partner, a dear friend, or marking another significant life event, today is an opportunity to honor connections that have shaped your journey.

templateContent: Happy Diwali, {name}! As this festival of lights celebrates the triumph of light over darkness, what brings light to your life that you're grateful for today?
audioPrompt: Diwali celebrates the victory of light over darkness and knowledge over ignorance. Today is a wonderful opportunity to reflect on the sources of light in your own life - whether people, activities, or values that illuminate your path.

templateContent: Happy Lunar New Year, {name}! As this celebration brings hope for new beginnings, what positive aspiration do you have for the coming year?
audioPrompt: The Lunar New Year represents fresh starts and renewed hope. It's traditionally a time to welcome good fortune and set positive intentions. Today offers a moment to consider what you're looking forward to in this new cycle.

templateContent: Happy Thanksgiving, {name}! Today is dedicated to gratitude. What are you most thankful for in your life right now?
audioPrompt: Thanksgiving invites us to pause and appreciate the blessings in our lives. Whether it's people, experiences, or simple comforts, taking time to acknowledge what we're grateful for can deepen our sense of contentment and connection.
